name: Edwin Sanjaya
title: Information System Master Graduate
Data Analyst
Business Analyst
Product Manager
Software Engineer in Test
content: Edwin is a Master of Science in Information Systems and Applications with a focus in Data Mining. As an experienced Product Manager and Software Engineer, he has honed his expertise in information technology industry, particularly within e-commerce, data, and web technologies. Edwin is deeply passionate about data analysis, the gaming industry, and digital commerce. He considers a growth mindset and compassion to be the foundation of his success.
